title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4040.4 - No riding or training if suspended
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4040.4 - No riding or training if suspended

State Regulations
A jockey or trainer under suspension in any state or
foreign country shall not be permitted to train or ride in a race for anyone
during the period of such suspension. Any person who shall employee a jockey or
trainer in contravention of this section may be punished as provided by
sections 4022.12 through
4022.15
of this

Article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4040.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
